Comments_List: We learnt a lot about human interaction with the geological world. We also learnt a lot more about the impact of human activity on the environment. Most interesting part for me was the health consequences of human interaction with minerals, mineral commodities and other geological elements.
strengths - guest speakers, variety of subjects, weaknesses - assignments and due dates were unclear, readings were not sent out far enough in advance
Well organized and informative. Guest lectures provided in-depth information about their fields of research.
Yes. Especially if you're interested in human interaction with the environment.
I would reccomend since the course allowed me to engage in academic conversation I have not found in other classes at yale.
